description: This trap is generated when a configuration change occurs
on the device within a specified period.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgChgNotify HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCurrentCfgChgSeqID i 9999 HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgChgSeqIDReveralCount i 9999 HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgChgTableMaxItem i 9999 HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgBaselineTime s EXAMPLE

description: The value of this object identifies the ID of the current configuration change.
The value ranges from 0 to 65535. After the ID of the configuration change reaches
the maximum value, the value of the ID starts from 1 again.
After the device is restarted, the value of the ID becomes 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCurrentCfgChgSeqID

description: The value of this object identifies the cycle count of the index of configuration change table.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgChgSeqIDReveralCount

description: The value of this object identifies the maximum number of entries in hwCfgChgTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgChgTableMaxItem

description: Specifies the time of system confiuration was baseline.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DATASYNC-MIB::hwCfgBaselineTime

description: The last save operation failed, please check the configuration.
